text: geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘naega geudaedeul-ege geugeosboda deo joh-eun geos-eul allyeojulio?’ (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehadeon jadeul-egeneun geudeul-ui junim geuncheoui cheongug-i iss-euni geu alaelobuteo gangdeul-i heuleumyeo geudeul-eun geu an-eseo meomul geos-ila. geuligo (geudeul-egeneun) sungyeolhan baeujadeulgwa hananim-eulobuteoui gippeum-i issnola. hananimkkeseoneun jongbogdeul-eul bogo gyesin bun-ila
